name: S-Blocks
description:
Simple puzzle game for anyone. Try your best, and be the best!

Very basic, simple puzzle game.

Drag pieces into the board and get a points. Choose correct pieces to fill vertical or horizontal line, and freeing space for the new pieces.

If there are no free space in the board your game will be end, and your score will be saved to the global ranking.

Best players could see their score in the BEST RESULT(Top 10 highscore)

To play the game, you do not need a register, you are only need enter your nickname.
